title: LoL Opens Like its in compatibility mode
body:
So this is what happens when I launch league to the login screen, it changes to 640x480. Or in another sense, its acting like I went into the launcher properties, went into the compatibility tab, and checked the option "Run in 640x480 screen resolution"

These are my pc specs:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.body: That's a strange issue!  Are you able to scale the client back to normal by holding CTRL and tapping the minus key?  Ctrl + and Ctrl - adjusts the screen size, so let me know if that does the trick.
Nope doesn't work. It doesn't change the client, it only changes the display resolution on the monitor.

Bummer, but thanks for trying that out.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look into this with you.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs for context, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll check this out and get back to you as soon as we can.
